revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=TP-LINK |model=TL-ER604W |revision=v1 |upc=845973041212 |asin=B00DBX9HPC |newegg= |price=120 |est_release_date=06/10/2013 |fcc_date=07/01/2013 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=Yes |availability=now |type=wireless router, VPN Router |fcc_id=TE7ER604WV1 |ic_id=8853A-ER604WV1 |pcb_id=2021500144 |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Atheros |cpu1_model=AR9341 |cpu1_cspeed=533 |fla1=8 |fla1_brand=Winbond |fla1_model=W25Q64BVSIG |ram1=64 |ram1_brand=Hynix |ram1_model=H5PS5162GFR |expansion_if_types= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_chip1_brand=Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=AR9341 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=RP-SMA |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu= |sw_brand=Atheros |sw_model=AR8327N |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=3 |wan_ports=2 |addl_chips= |flags=metal case |stock_os= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip=192.168.0.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin |oui= |oui_eth= }} {{TagLine|SafeStream Wireless N Gigabit Broadband VPN Router}} :[http://www.tp-link.com/en/products/details/?categoryid=2946&model=TL-ER604W Product page] {{•}} [http://www.tp-link.com/resources/document/TL-ER604W_V1_Datasheet.pdf Datasheet] {{•}} [http://www.tp-link.us/resources/simulator/TL-ER604W/userRpm/Index.htm Interface simulator]
"2021500144" and "Rev:1.0" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. *The Flash chip used may be a 8MB W25Q64BVSIG (or something like that). *It would appear the device is using an ''[[Atheros]]'' AR934x WiSoC :(... or some other similarly specced WiSoC).
The manual states that the device is using.. *A MIPS32 network processor *64MB of DDR2 RAM
''TP-LINK'' specifies the device has 4kV lightning protection.. :hence the ''SafeStream'' designation.
The power supply shown in the FCC photos is a ''TP-LINK'' branded :T120100-2B1 (100-240VAC ~ 50/60Hz, 0.3A -> 12VDC, 1A).
===See also=== *[[TP-LINK TL-ER6120]] - SafeStream Dual-WAN VPN Router *[[TP-LINK TL-ER6020]] - SafeStream Dual-WAN VPN Router *[[TP-LINK TL-ER5120]] - Load Balance Broadband Gigabit Router (4x WAN) :v2: CPU: [[Cavium]] Dual-Core @500MHz [https://www.snbforums.com/threads/tp-link-tl-er5120-multiwan-router-350mb-throughput-for-250-anyone-use-this.6612/ MIPS64], Flash: 8MB, RAM: 128MB *[[TP-LINK TL-R600VPN]] - SafeStream Gigabit Broadband VPN Cable Router :CPU: [[Realtek]] RTL8198 (-GR), Flash: 8MB, RAM: 64MB • [https://www.smallnetbuilder.com/lanwan/lanwan-reviews/32424-tp-link-tl-r600vpn-safestream-gigabit-broadband-vpn-router-reviewed SNB Review] <!--(2021500127)--> *[[TP-LINK TL-R470T+]] - Load Balance Broadband Router (4x WAN) :v6.0 - CPU: [[Realtek]] RTL8197 (-GR), Flash: 4MB, RAM: 32/64MB *[[TP-LINK TL-R480T+]] - Load Balance Broadband Router (2x WAN) :v2/v3 - CPU: [[Intel]] FWIXP420BB (@266MHz), Switch: [[Marvell]] 88E6063 :v4/v5 - CPU: [[Realtek]]
